name: LiMiT's Escape Room Games 2
description:
In the next chapter of the Escape Room bundle you can expect 4 levels with a lot to discover and solve. The 4 levels differ in difficulty:

  • Lake (Difficulty: Easy)
  • Warehouse (Difficulty: Medium)
  • Cabin (Difficulty: Medium)
  • Mineshaft (Difficulty: Hard)

Start on a lobby map where you can meet up with your friends. Here you can choose a character, make settings, spend the time with puzzles you've already unlocked in the Escape Rooms, and play a challenge or two with or against your friends.
Then, when you're all ready, start a level and the fun begins.

  • Move around in the 3D first person perspective (this time also with jumping :D)
  • Lobby map with arcade levels of unlocked puzzles
  • Play with up to 8 players (2-4 recommended)
  • Tricky puzzles
  • 4 levels with different difficulty
  • Hint system

For questions, feedback or support requests join my Discord or write in the discussion section.
